ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards]  Charming
ygData.msgSnippet: if you are outside you should never get smacked when recharming, no matter how many resists it takes.  remember you can move and sing at the same time.  should
ygData.messageBody:
if you are outside you should never get smacked when recharming, no matter how
many resists it takes. remember you can move and sing at the same time. should
just back off from the 2 things fighting with selos on. when charm breaks, start running
in a circle with the charm/charm/selo's sequence until charm retakes. if you get adds
then you have to run in a circle continuously but you should still never get hit.

At 11:35 AM 5/31/00 -0600, you wrote:
>I've been weaving exclusively non-targeted songs while charming. Largo's is
>a good choice since it ensures your pet will likely beat an opponent mob
>that is his identical twin. Another good choice is Hymn if you aren't
>outside running around. I use Selo's if I'm outside just to get an extra
>recharm chance or two before getting smacked.
>
> Kit
